claim.text: 78% of computer science students use YouTube to supplement traditional learning materials
claim.exact_quote: With 78% of computer science students utilizing YouTube to supplement traditional learning materials, there's a clear demand for high-quality video content.

conclusion.limitations: no source or methodology provided for this statistic

claim.text: 73% of students prefer curated video libraries
claim.exact_quote: However, the challenge of finding appropriate resources has led 73% of students to prefer curated video libraries.

conclusion.limitations: no source or methodology provided for this statistic

claim.text: The platform's vector database implementation improves domain-specific search accuracy
claim.exact_quote: Since the vector database contains only domain-specific vectors, the results will naturally be restricted to that domain.

evidence.evidence_text: Vector database implementation is described in methodology but no experimental results are provided to support improved accuracy
evidence.limitations: No quantitative results or comparisons provided
evidence.exact_quote: When querying, we can further restrict the results to specific sub-domains by applying filters based on these metadata tags, ensuring more precise domain-specific outcomes.

conclusion.limitations: theoretical description only, no experimental validation or comparative results
